sentences.en: Bodies connected to each other by certain energy storage or energy dissipation devices furnish additional examples.
sentences.cn: 用某种能量存储或散逸装置相互连接的物体则是这种情况的另一例子.

sentences.en: Can you furnish the committee with statements of the costs?
sentences.cn: 你能把开支清单提交委员会 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can you see me knowing how to furnish a house?
sentences.cn: 你能想象我懂得怎样布置一所房子 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fresh - water lakes and streams furnish nearly all of our surface water supplies.
sentences.cn: 我们所用的地表水几乎全由淡水湖和河流供给.

sentences.en: Having bought the house, they couldn’t afford to furnish it.
sentences.cn: 买下房子后，他们没有钱买家具了。

sentences.en: His proposal shall furnish the basis for our discussion.
sentences.cn: 他的提议成为我们讨论的依据.

sentences.en: How are you going to furnish the house?
I will furnish all you need.
sentences.cn: 我愿供给你所需要的一切.

sentences.en: I'll furnish you with all you need.
sentences.cn: 我将提供你所需要的一切.

sentences.en: It did not furnish an explantation for the heat generated by friction.
sentences.cn: 它未能圆满地解释因摩擦而产生的热.

sentences.en: Many proprietors try to furnish their hotels with antiques.
sentences.cn: 许多经营者都想用古董装饰他们的酒店。

sentences.en: That was a typically French way to furnish a room.
sentences.cn: 这屋里的陈设纯属法国风格.

sentences.en: The company will furnish each contestant with a free ticket.
sentences.cn: 公司将为每个参赛者免费提供一张票.

sentences.en: They'll be able to furnish you with the rest of the details.
sentences.cn: 他们将可向你提供其余的细节。

sentences.en: We propose to furnish our own house according to our own taste.
sentences.cn: 我们建议按自己的爱好布置自己的房子.

sentences.en: Will these finds furnish more information on prehistoric man?
sentences.cn: 这些发现是否能提供更多有关史前人类的资料？

sentences.en: You say if I furnish you the money you will deed me the land.
sentences.cn: 你说如果我借给你这笔钱,你愿意把田地抵押给我.

trans.tran_en: to put furniture and other things into a house or room

trans.tran_cn: 陈设，布置，提供，供应，装修（房屋）
trans.tran_en: to put furniture and other things into a house or room
